entry.title: Website Live
entry.content:
Decided to try and put some writing up on the internet, so I have purchased this domain and set it all up using a static site generator called Hexo and have used a great theme called Cactus.

Hopefully, getting this all set up will encourage me to share some writing with anyone unfortunate enough to come across it!

I’m on the Twitter, and may also cross-post some stuff to Medium, but haven’t decided on that yet.

Thanks for visiting!
